title: Amazon API Gateway to Amazon Kinesis
description: Create an Amazon API Gateway to Amazon Kinesis REST API

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern creates an Amazon API Gateway REST API that integrates with an Amazon Kinesis data stream using AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) in Typescript.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Mudassar Bashir
authors.bio: Solution Architect at Amazon Web Services.
authors.name: Brittany Ly
authors.bio: Solution Architect at Amazon Web Services
